name: MagicLess
description:
This is an early build for our first game as hobbyist!

Any feedback is welcome!

The Story

After his master died prematurely in his sleep, a young wizard apprentice with no magic skills must explore a strange forest in order to access the cradle of magic, an old and forgotten ruin.

Help him find his way and survive against strong enemies and bosses and maybe elucidate the mystery about the death of his master.

The Game

MagicLess is a 2D pixel-art Metroidvania with strong and unique enemies, deep exploration, NPC dialogues, quests and even bosses!

Features (for now) :   

  • 1h30h of gameplay
  • 8+ enemies with unique pattern
  • 2 NPCs with dialogue and basic quests (need to design new rewards)
  • 1 boss

Support both controller and keyboard.

If you are experiencing slow performance, simply disable light via the main menu.
